prompts: Create a steel-type Pokemon with a sleek blue design and sharp metallic features.
I want a Pokemon that resembles a robotic creature, combining elements of both steel and psychic types.
Generate a Pokemon with a rounded body and angular limbs, featuring a bright blue color scheme.
Make a Pokemon that has a mechanical appearance and can be found in urban environments.
Imagine a Pokemon known for its defensive capabilities, with spiked armor and a cool color palette.
Design a Pokemon with a unique shape, blending both futuristic and natural elements in its design.
Give me a Pokemon that showcases a combination of strength and intelligence, perfect for battles.
